name: Rail Reflector
description:
Fight waves of enemies in this Arcade Style top down space alien shoot'em up.
Build mirror shields to reflect your bullets around the arena and help prevent the aliens from destroying the shield wall at your back!

Originally Designed for two players in an arcade box!

CONTROLS
1 - Insert Coin

Up - W
Down - S
Left - A
Right - D
Fire - Mouse 1
Shift - Build Mirror Shield
Q - Select Upgrade 1 
E - Select Upgrade 2
